channel.title: Whonix gateway 15 bug?
channel.description:
Perhaps not a bug per say but Whonix gateway has so little memory that it can run out of memory when doing an upgrade. This has happened with me.
I'm worried that when it kills processes to free up memory without control that something unexpected will happen, maybe it will let through traffic without using Tor?
I recommend Whonix Gateway to always have more memory than 512 to avoid this, probably at least 1 GB.

item.title: Whonix gateway 15 bug?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
rob75 via Whonix Forum:

maybe it will let through traffic without using Tor?

No. See technical introduction in Whonix wiki/Dev

Read full topic
